description: An ancient settlement, located at modern Lashkargāh (formerly Bost/Boost) in Helmand province, Afghanistan.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Qila-i-Bust AFG

names.details: Bust: A big city in the province of Sicistān (Sistan), by the Hind Nehri (Indus River?). Its date palms, grapes, and most of its fruits are rare in other cities. [translation]
